00050   class IOHandler : public ReferenceCount {
00051 
00052   public:
00053 
00054     IOHandler(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) : m_addr(addr), m_sd(sd), m_dispatch_handler_ptr(dhp) {
00055       ReactorFactory::get_reactor(m_reactor_ptr);
00056       m_poll_interest = 0;
00057       socklen_t namelen = sizeof(m_local_addr);
00058       getsockname(m_sd, (sockaddr *)&m_local_addr, &namelen);
00059       memset(&m_alias, 0, sizeof(m_alias));
00060     }
00061 
00062 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00063     virtual bool handle_event(struct kevent *event) = 0;
00064 #elif defined(__linux__)
00065     virtual bool handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) = 0;
00066 #else
00067     ImplementMe;
00068 #endif
00069 
00070     virtual ~IOHandler() { return; }
00071 
00072     void deliver_event(Event *event) {
00073       memcpy(&event->localAddr, &m_local_addr, sizeof(m_local_addr));
00074       if (!m_dispatch_handler_ptr) {
00075         HT_INFOF("%s", event->toString().c_str());
00076         delete event;
00077       }
00078       else {
00079         EventPtr eventPtr(event);
00080         m_dispatch_handler_ptr->handle(eventPtr);
00081       }
00082     }
00083 
00084     void deliver_event(Event *event, DispatchHandler *dh) {
00085       memcpy(&event->localAddr, &m_local_addr, sizeof(m_local_addr));
00086       if (!dh) {
00087         if (!m_dispatch_handler_ptr) {
00088           HT_INFOF("%s", event->toString().c_str());
00089           delete event;
00090         }
00091         else {
00092           EventPtr eventPtr(event);
00093           m_dispatch_handler_ptr->handle(eventPtr);
00094         }
00095       }
00096       else {
00097         EventPtr eventPtr(event);
00098         dh->handle(eventPtr);
00099       }
00100     }
00101 
00102     void start_polling() {
00103 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00104       add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY);
00105 #elif defined(__linux__)
00106       struct epoll_event event;
00107       memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00108       event.data.ptr = this;
00109       event.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP;
00110       if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, m_sd, &event) < 0) {
00111         HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, %d, EPOLLIN|EPOLLERR|EPOLLHUP) failed : %s",
00112                      m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, m_sd, strerror(errno));
00113         exit(1);
00114       }
00115       m_poll_interest |= Reactor::READ_READY;
00116 #endif
00117     }
00118 
00119     void add_poll_interest(int mode);
00120 
00121     void remove_poll_interest(int mode);
00122 
00123     struct sockaddr_in &get_address() { return m_addr; }
00124 
00125     struct sockaddr_in &get_local_address() { return m_local_addr; }
00126 
00127     void get_local_address(struct sockaddr_in *addrPtr) {
00128       memcpy(addrPtr, &m_local_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00129     }
00130 
00131     void set_alias(struct sockaddr_in &alias) {
00132       memcpy(&m_alias, &alias, sizeof(m_alias));
00133     }
00134 
00135     void get_alias(struct sockaddr_in *aliasp) {
00136       memcpy(aliasp, &m_alias, sizeof(m_alias));
00137     }
00138 
00139     int get_sd() { return m_sd; }
00140 
00141     void get_reactor(ReactorPtr &reactor_ptr) { reactor_ptr = m_reactor_ptr; }
00142 
00143     void shutdown() { 
00144       struct TimerT timer;
00145       m_reactor_ptr->schedule_removal(this);
00146       boost::xtime_get(&timer.expireTime, boost::TIME_UTC);
00147       timer.expireTime.nsec += 200000000LL;
00148       timer.handler = 0;
00149       m_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00150     }
00151 
00152   protected:
00153 
00154     void stop_polling() {
00155 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00156       remove_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00157 #elif defined(__linux__)
00158       struct epoll_event event;  // this is necessary for < Linux 2.6.9
00159       if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, m_sd, &event) < 0) {
00160         HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, %d) failed : %s",
00161                      m_reactor_ptr->pollFd, m_sd, strerror(errno));
00162         exit(1);
00163       }
00164       m_poll_interest = 0;
00165 #endif
00166     }
00167 
00168     struct sockaddr_in  m_addr;
00169     struct sockaddr_in  m_local_addr;
00170     struct sockaddr_in  m_alias;
00171     int                 m_sd;
00172     DispatchHandlerPtr  m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00173     ReactorPtr          m_reactor_ptr;
00174     int                 m_poll_interest;
00175 
00176 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00177     void display_event(struct kevent *event);
00178 #elif defined(__linux__)
00179     void display_event(struct epoll_event *event);
00180 #endif
00181   };
00182   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<IOHandler> IOHandlerPtr;
00183 
00184   struct ltiohp {
00185     bool operator()(const IOHandlerPtr &p1, const IOHandlerPtr &p2) const {
00186       return p1.get() < p2.get();
00187     }
00188   };
